LanguageData.AP_AutoPermitExplanation: Permits will be used (if possible) the moment their cooldown ends
LanguageData.AP_UseOnCaravan_Tooltip: If enabled the permits will be automatically used for pawns on caravans (if caravan weight capacity will allow).
LanguageData.AP_ColonyMapsOnly_Tooltip: If enabled the permits will only be used on maps that are considered player colonies. If disabled the permits may get triggered when raiding hostile camps or on quest maps.
LanguageData.AP_NoValidPermits: {PAWN_nameDef} has no permits that can be automatically used.
